modName: How to make some parts of an armor transparent translucent invisible disappear
summary: A step-by-step guide in a pdf file to show how to make parts of an armor transparent, translucent or invisible.
descriptionHtml:
Just to share a new trick I\'ve learnt to make some parts of your armor disappear.

So here is a step-by-step guide in a pdf file to show how to make parts of an armor transparent, translucent or invisible.

I\'m just a humble beginner, so this guide is intended mainly for beginners. Experienced modders, do guide me where I\'ve gone wrong :) 

You will need:
1. Photoshop with .dds plugin
2. NifSkope

---------

Update:
Thanks to lidowxx for bringing this up. Some textures do not have an Alpha 1 layer. In such cases, all you need to do is create a new layer and name it the same Alpha 1, then fill it all with white. Somehow Photoshop can recognize it\'s an Alpha 1 layer, and auto-hide it when the other layers are visible. Hope this works for you.

---------

Credits to these websites for showing how this is done:
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/484339-how-do-you-make-texture-transparent/
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t9v4-WXih8E

Credits also to Alan\'s BBP Armor Mod for the large collection of fine-looking armors and outfits.
